channel.title: How do i make my client a .exe and also make so the files are all uneditable?
channel.description: I wont to release a .exe uneditable client , doesnt anybody know how to do this?

item.title: How do i make my client a .exe and also make so the files are all uneditable?
item.dc:creator: @thanks_u thanks u
item.description:
@thanks_u wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=thanks u link=topic=439145.msg3227519#msg3227519 date=1275729436]

I wont to release a .exe uneditable client , doesnt anybody know how to do this?

This is so people cant change ip of your client :

  1. Right click on the file folder where u got all files
  2. Click on Rightprotected
  3. Then Click On Apply Then Tou are done lol nvm its easy but all dont know how =D
    [/quote]

Then people can just right-click it and unselect it, which solves nothing.[/quote]
yes but they need to change something in alternativ and not all people click on show hidden files…
UNDERSTAND and something else i just waned to help

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my client a .exe and also make so the files are all uneditable?
